## directory.directoryNames() function

get subdirectory names that exist in the provided directory path

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function directoryNames(path: string): string[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | <code>string</code> | path of the directory to get the sub directories of |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string[]`

directory names
